Title: Relates to national instant criminal background checks and ammunition; repealer
Summary: Removes ammunition and ammunition sales from the requirements of background checks; repeals certain provisions of law relating thereto; repeals the background check fund.
LawCode: Rpld §400.02 sub 2, Pen L; amd §228, rpld §228 sub 5, sub 6 ¶c, Exec L; rpld §99-pp, St Fin L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the executive law, in relation to national instant criminal background checks; and to repeal certain provisions of the penal law, the executive law and the state finance law relating thereto
